Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.id = ..%Id() set proxy.birthday = ..BirthDay set proxy.firstname = ..FirstName.Value set proxy.lastname = ..LastName.Value set proxy.middlename = ..MiddleName.Value set proxy.phone = ..Phone set proxy.email = ..Email set proxy.skype = ..Skype set proxy.agree = ..MailAgree set proxy.cache = ..CacheScience.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.ensemble = ..EnsembleScience.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.deepsee = ..DeepSeeScience.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.tet = ..TET.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.pet = ..PET.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.resume = ..Resume.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.city = ..City.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.university = ..University.ConvertToProxyObject()
quit proxy

UDLText.name: T
